items.sentence: Teaching children is easier than teaching adults.
I've been playing the piano since I was thirteen.
Tom was a guitar teacher before he became famous.
Tom was a few inches shorter than Mary last year.
I asked Tom if he really thought I could do that.
Who is that person over there wearing sunglasses?
Tom usually eats a soft-boiled egg for breakfast.
Tom kept telling everybody that that wasn't true.
She is not accustomed to driving for a long time.
Swimming is one thing that Tom and I are good at.
